title: The Doctress with Healing Hands: Your Highness, Please Behave Yourself - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Marriage   Military   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Transmigration
author: He Yexin   Heart Of Lotus Leaf   荷叶心
description: Bai Qingqing, the disciple of the Divine Physician, with goodwill, treats the domineering Prince for blindness, only to render herself at the mercy of him. In the name of practicing medicine, the doctress makes him have spicy cuisine for every meal as revenge. Seeing him frown upon the food, sweat at the pungent dishes, she is merely stoked! Poor Qingqing is no villain material, she ends up having a soft spot for him. Her tender care for the Prince unknowingly reveals her biggest secret-her true identity. After the prince's eyes are cured, he mobilizes the military with great fanfare to keep her around…>
